intro: As a CSIT (Computer Science And Information Technology) student, I am currently pursuing a degree/diploma in the field of technology and computing. I am knowledgeable in C, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Tailwind, and ReactJS. I possess the ability to work independently or in a team. I am eager to apply my skills and knowledge to the IT industry.
